meanings.definition: The bitter root of the felwort plant, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist collected felwort roots for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The bitter taste of felwort root lingered on his tongue.
meanings.sent3: Despite its bitterness, the felwort root was a sought-after remedy.

meanings.sent5: She brewed a tea with felwort root to soothe her upset stomach.
